actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts paid to certain related individuals shall be allowable as a deduction under the provision permitting a deduction for dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.

summary.text: Provides that amounts paid to qualified related individuals shall be allowable as a deduction under the provision of the Internal Revenue Code permitting a deduction for dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts paid to certain related individuals shall be allowable as a deduction under the provision permitting a deduction for dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.
